title: Bloomberg's Nizza on Trump Reaffirming Anti-Immigration (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Nizza on Trump Reaffirming Anti-Immigration (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Mike Nizza, Executive Editor for Bloomberg Politics, on Trump's visit to Mexico and immigration speech.
